title: KR Staffing job portal (trust-building, mobile-first) with job listings and admin job management

requirements.text: Implement a consistent, mobile-first visual theme for KR Staffing: clean white background, red as primary accent, neutral grays for borders/text, modern readable typography, spacious layout, and accessible contrast. Apply the theme consistently across all pages and components.

quotes:
DESIGN STYLE:
• Simple, clean, professional
• White background with red highlight color
• Mobile-first responsive design
• Easy navigation & fast loading

acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a single coherent design system (colors, typography, spacing, buttons, cards).
Primary actions (e.g., Find Jobs / Apply Now) use the red accent color and meet accessible contrast.
Layouts adapt cleanly to small screens first; no horizontal overflow on common mobile widths.

requirements.text: Create the site header + navigation for KR Staffing with logo and menu links: Home, Jobs, Categories, About Us, Contact Us, Apply Now. Include optional Login/Register entry points in the header UI (not required to block job browsing).

quotes:
1) Header
• KR Staffing logo
• Menu: Home | Jobs | Categories | About Us | Contact Us | Apply Now
• Login / Register option (optional)

acceptanceCriteria: Header shows logo + the specified menu items.
Navigation works on mobile (hamburger / drawer) and desktop.
Login/Register entry points are visible but do not prevent browsing jobs when not logged in.

requirements.text: Build the homepage with the requested sections and English user-facing copy that matches a trust-focused tone: Hero (heading, subheading, keyword+city search + Find Jobs), Popular Job Searches, Popular Job Categories, Featured Jobs (job cards + Load More), Why Choose KR Staffing, Testimonials, Contact (WhatsApp support button + contact form), and Footer (About, Quick links, Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, copyright).

quotes:
HOMEPAGE SECTIONS:
1) Header
...
9) Footer
• About KR Staffing
• Quick links
• Privacy Policy
• Terms & Conditions
• © KR Staffing – All Rights Reserved

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage contains all 9 sections in the order specified (may be visually rearranged for mobile, but all present).
Hero search has fields for keyword and city and a Find Jobs button that takes the user to Jobs with filters applied.
Featured Jobs renders job cards with Title, Location, Company, and Apply Now; Load More loads additional jobs without a full page refresh.

requirements.text: Implement a Jobs listing page with search and filters for keyword and city, rendering job cards with title, location, company name, and Apply Now. Include pagination via a Load More pattern.

quotes:
FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS:
• Job listing page

2) Hero Section
• Search bar:
  – Job title / keyword
  – City
  – Button: “Find Jobs”

5) Featured Jobs Section
• Load More Jobs button

acceptanceCriteria: Jobs page supports filtering by keyword and city.
Job cards show title, location, company, and Apply Now.
Load More fetches the next page and appends results; a loading state is shown.

requirements.text: Implement a Categories page that lists the provided categories and allows users to click into a filtered Jobs view by category.

quotes:
4) Popular Job Categories
• Delivery
• Sales Executive
• Telecaller
• Field Executive
• Warehouse
• Back Office
• Marketing / Digital

acceptanceCriteria: Categories page renders the listed categories as clickable items.
Clicking a category navigates to Jobs filtered by that category.
The selected category is reflected in the UI (e.g., filter pill or heading).

requirements.text: Add About Us, Contact Us, Privacy Policy, and Terms & Conditions pages with simple, trust-building English copy describing KR Staffing’s process and avoiding unrealistic claims.

quotes:
CONTENT TONE:
• Simple English + Hindi mix
• Trust-focused
• No fake promises
• Clear job process explanation

9) Footer
• Privacy Policy
• Terms & Conditions

acceptanceCriteria: Each page is reachable from header/footer links.
Copy is clear and trust-focused and does not contain exaggerated guarantees.
Pages are responsive and match the site theme.

requirements.text: Implement the Apply Now flow so that all Apply Now buttons (Featured Jobs and Jobs page) open a configurable Google Form URL (in a new tab). If possible, include job title and city as prefilled query parameters when the Google Form supports it; otherwise open the base form URL.

quotes:
FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS:
• Apply form linked to Google Form

5) Featured Jobs Section
• Apply Now button

acceptanceCriteria: Apply Now opens a Google Form URL configured in the app (not hard-coded to an unknown value).
Opens in a new tab and does not break SPA navigation.
If prefill is configured, the job title/city are passed through correctly; otherwise it still opens the form.

requirements.text: Add WhatsApp click-to-chat integration via a prominent WhatsApp support button (homepage contact section and optionally a floating action button). Also add Instagram and WhatsApp channel links in the footer/contact area. All links must be configurable (phone number / URLs) via a single frontend configuration file.

quotes:
8) Contact Section
• WhatsApp support button

FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS:
• WhatsApp click-to-chat integration
• Instagram & WhatsApp channel links

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the WhatsApp button opens wa.me or api.whatsapp.com with the configured phone number/message.
Instagram and WhatsApp channel links are visible and open the configured URLs.
All social/contact URLs are stored in one configuration location and can be changed without touching multiple components.

requirements.text: Create backend data models and APIs for job management, including: create job, update job, list jobs (with pagination), and search/filter by keyword, city, and category. Seed the system with a small set of example jobs matching the portal’s domain (delivery/telecaller/field exec/warehouse/back office).

quotes: Admin can add/edit jobs easily
Find delivery, telecaller, field executive & warehouse jobs near you

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes methods to create and update jobs.
Backend exposes a list/search method supporting pagination and the specified filters.
A fresh deployment shows example jobs without requiring admin input first.

requirements.text: Build an admin-friendly job management UI where an authenticated admin can add/edit jobs easily (title, company, city/location, category, description, and any optional metadata like salary/type). Gate admin actions behind Internet Identity and a backend admin allowlist of principals.

quotes:
FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS:
• Admin can add/edit jobs easily
• Login / Register option (optional)

acceptanceCriteria: Non-authenticated users cannot access admin create/edit actions (UI and backend enforce this).
Authenticated admin can create a new job and see it appear on Jobs and Featured Jobs.
Authenticated admin can edit an existing job and see updates reflected on public pages.

requirements.text: Implement the homepage Contact form (name, mobile number, city, message) to submit to the backend and store inquiries for admin review in the admin area (read-only list is sufficient).

quotes:
8) Contact Section
• Contact form:
  – Name
  – Mobile number
  – City
  – Message

acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the contact form shows success/error states and does not reload the page.
Inquiry data is persisted in the backend.
Admin can view a list of submitted inquiries in the admin UI.

requirements.text: Ensure performance and UX basics: fast initial load, skeleton/loading states for job lists, empty states (no jobs found), and clear error messaging. Keep navigation simple and consistent.

quotes: Easy navigation & fast loading

acceptanceCriteria: Jobs/Featured Jobs show loading indicators and handle errors gracefully.
When no results match filters, an empty state is shown with guidance to change filters.
Key pages score well on basic Lighthouse-style checks (no major layout shift, images optimized, minimal blocking UI).

requirements.text: Use English for all user-facing text throughout the app (including headings, buttons, testimonials, labels). Maintain a trust-building tone and clearly describe the job application process without unrealistic promises.

quotes: Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.

Trust-focused
• No fake promises
• Clear job process explanation

acceptanceCriteria: No Hindi/mixed-language copy is shown in the UI; all visible UI strings are English.
Copy explains the process (search jobs → apply via form → staffing team contacts) without guarantees.
Testimonials read as realistic, short success stories (no extreme claims).

requirements.text: Add static asset handling for generated brand images: include the generated logo and favicon in the header and browser tab, and ensure they are served as static files from frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: • KR Staffing logo

acceptanceCriteria: Logo renders in the header in appropriate sizes for mobile/desktop.
Favicon is set and visible in the browser tab.
Assets are referenced from frontend/public/assets/generated (not fetched from backend).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).

Do not modify any frontend files under immutablePaths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose instead).
No external databases or third-party auth providers; Internet Identity only if auth is implemented.
No email/SMS sending integrations; contact form must store data in-app instead of sending email.
nonGoals: Building an enterprise-focused staffing SaaS for multiple companies (this site is only for KR Staffing).
Implementing real-time chat, push notifications, or WebSockets.
Payments, subscriptions, or paid job postings.
Advanced ATS features (resume parsing, interview scheduling, background checks).

required: Minimal, professional KR Staffing wordmark logo in red/black on transparent background (kr-staffing-logo.dim_512x128.png)
Square favicon with KR Staffing initials in red on white background (kr-staffing-favicon.dim_128x128.png)
Simple flat hero illustration representing job search (abstract people + checklist + location pin) with red accents on white background (hero-illustration.dim_1200x600.png)
